text.section: Consent for a postmortem examination of a body by a physician is sufficient if the consent is given as provided in this section.

section.section: If a person does not assume control of a body under paragraph (1) of this subsection, the consent may be given by the State Anatomy Board.

text.section:
The consent may be in the form of:
A written document;
A telegram; or
A recorded telephonic or other recorded message.
